title: eppaDi pADinarO
sahitya:
eppaDi pADinarO tiruvadiyAr appaDi pADa nAn Ashai koNDEn shivanE



(eppaDi)







anupallavi







apparum sundararum ALuDai piLLaiyum aruL maNi vAcakarum



poruLuNarnDu unnaiyE 



(eppaDi)







caraNam







gurumaNi shankararum arumai tAyumAnArum aruNagirinAtharum arutjyOti vaLLalum



karuNaikkaDal perugi kAdalinAl urugi kanittamizh sollinAl



inidunai anudinam 



(eppaDi)
